data.description: The top skin in a model is printed to reach the minimum thickness set in the print profile. However, some models need a lighter internal geometry. This setting removes the top skin horizontally slightly, where infill would normally be printed.
data.img_description: The right image shows the solid model, the center image without skin removal, the right image with skin removal enabled.
data.hints: - Removing top skin in unnecessary places, reduces print time slightly.
